mapper.sql: id, brand_code, series_code, series_name, logo_url, series_level, structure, engine, gearbox, guide_price_start, guide_price_end, car_imports, series_score, order_by, ctime
mapper.select:
select
from fss_car_series where brand_code = #{brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by series_score desc
